item.title: Authentication Request Identification
item.description: Authentication Request Identification This add-on includes a passive scan rule which attempts to identify authentication requests. It identifies authentication requests by the presence of commonly used username and password field names. It also uses commonly used URL segments to identify more likely authentication requests, and uses commonly used registration URL segments to ignore registration requests.

item.title: Browser Based Authentication
item.description: Browser Based Authentication This add-on adds a new authentication type which uses a browser to login to the target website. It uses the first field with a type of “text” or “email” for the user name and the first field with a type of “password” for the password.

item.title: Header Based Session Management
item.description: Header Based Session Management This add-on adds a new session management type which supports an arbitrary number of headers. The header values can include the following tokens: {%json:path.to.data%} JSON authentication response data {%env:env_var%} Environmental variable {%script:glob_var%} Global script variable {%header:env_var%} Authentication response header {%url:key%} Authentication URL param When adding Header Based Session Management via the API the headers parameter is a string of header:value pairs separated by newline characters: \n.
